name: emi.ge-utils
description: The EMI GE Utils is a set of utilities to configure a CREAM GE system appropriately with YAIM
releaseNotes:
What's new

    This is the first release in EMI of CREAM (S)GE module, supporting the "Open Grid Scheduler" implementation.



Installation and configuration

    Since the CREAM GE module is deployed together with CREAM, please refer to the installation and configuration notes for the whole CREAM-CE



Known issues

    Please refer to the CREAM known issues page



Documentation changes:

    Modified section "Batch system integration" of CREAM SystemAdministratorGuide For EMI1
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
